description: Apple Hebbal is the company's first retail store in South India, located in Phoenix Mall, Bengaluru. The store has a theme inspired by Peacocks and is the third store, following Apple BKC in Mumbai and Apple Saket in Delhi. Bengaluru’s first Apple Store opens for consumers on Tuesday, September 2, at 1 pm IST.
title: Apple Hebbal, Bengaluru’s first Apple Store, Opens Today

description: Maalik, starring Rajkummar Rao, Prosenjit Chatterjee, and Manushi Chhillar, is a gripping gangster drama set in 1980s Allahabad. Directed by Pulkit, it combines crime, politics, and survival. Following its theatrical run, the film will soon be available for streaming on Amazon Prime Video.
title: Rajkummar Rao's Maalik Set for OTT Release: Know When, Where to Watch Online

description: Scientists have created a washable fibre computer that integrates sensors, processors, and communication modules into a single strand. Tested in garments, the fibres achieved up to 95% accuracy in detecting human movements. Researchers say the breakthrough could lead to practical smart clothing, though challenges like energy use and communication speed remain.
title: Washable Fiber Computer Could Transform the Future of Smart Clothing, Study Finds

description: NASA astronaut Megan McArthur, the first woman to pilot a SpaceX Dragon spacecraft, retires after 20 years. She logged 213 days in space, flew two missions, and was the last to handle the Hubble Telescope. Her contributions to ISS science and leadership roles shaped future lunar and Mars exploration, leaving a lasting mark on NASA’s mission
title: Who Is Megan McArthur, the First Woman to Pilot NASA's SpaceX Dragon?

description: Aankhon Ki Gustaakhiyan is a lighthearted romance drama movie that stars Vikrant Massey and Shanaya Kapoor in the lead roles. The movie follows a blind musician and a stage artist, who connect and bond well during a train journey. However, unaware of their identities, will their love grow?
title: Aankhon Ki Gustaakhiyan OTT Release is Here: All the Details about This Vikrant Massey Starrer

description: The European Space Agency’s Jupiter Icy Moons Explorer (JUICE) successfully executed a Venus flyby on August 31, 2025, using the planet’s gravity to speed toward Jupiter. Engineers overcame a brief antenna glitch before the maneuver, and the spacecraft endured Venus’s intense heat by shielding itself with its high-gain antenna.
title: ESA’s JUICE Probe Uses Venus Flyby to Stay on Track for Jupiter’s Icy Moons

description: Astronauts aboard the ISS concluded a week of research on bone health, brain adaptation, and eye function while servicing spacesuits and systems. The crew also captured Earth imagery and prepared for the upcoming Cygnus cargo mission launching on a SpaceX Falcon 9 rocket this September.
title: ISS Crew Studies Bone Loss and Brain Adaptation to Safeguard Astronaut Health

description: NASA plans to build a 100-kilowatt nuclear fission reactor on the Moon’s south pole by 2030 to power Artemis missions and future lunar bases. The site offers access to water ice but raises legal and diplomatic concerns under the Outer Space Treaty. With China and Russia advancing their own lunar power plants, the move from the US.
title: NASA Unveils Plans for Lunar Nuclear Reactor by 2030 Amid Rising Moon Race

description: Saiyaara is the emotional and romantic drama of Krrish and Vaani, who meet under unexpected conditions and through their own challenges, and become friends. Their bond also turns into love, telling a different and unique tale of true love in this area.
title: Saiyaara OTT Release: Know When and Where to Watch Ahaan Pandey, Aneet Padda-Starring Blockbuster Film Online

description: Written and directed by Aryan Khan, The Bads of Bollywood is an upcoming web series that stars Lakshya and Sahher Bambba in the lead roles. The series follows a young man and his friends trying to get into the film industry. However, the stakes are higher and the chaos is real. Will they make it?
title: The Bads of Bollywood OTT Release: Know When, Where to Watch Bobby Deol-Starring Series Online

description: Jeff Dean, a chief scientist working with Google DeepMind, has an aversion to talking about artificial general intelligence (AGI). The scientist revealed his preference during a conversation in the Moonshot Podcast, where he also picked up on topics around Google Brain, artificial intelligence (AI), as well as the breakthroughs made by DeepMind.
title: Google’s Chief Scientist Jeff Dean Says He Does Not Like to Talk About AGI

description: Xiaomi 16 series, comprising the Xiaomi 16 and Xiaomi 16 Pro, are tipped to go official in the last week of September. They are expected to be the first devices launching with the Snapdragon 8 Elite 2 chipset. They could feature a triple rear camera unit and a 50-megapixel front-facing camera.
title: Xiaomi 16 Series Launch Timeline Tipped; Could Be First Phones With Snapdragon 8 Elite 2 SoC

description: Acer TravelLite Essential series laptops have launched in India with two processor options. Buyers can choose between Intel Core i5-1334U and AMD Ryzen 5 7430U processor options. The laptops feature a 14-inch full-HD IPS display and have a 36Whr battery that Acer claims can deliver up to eight hours of runtime on a single charge.
title: Acer TravelLite Essential Series With 14-Inch Display, AMD and Intel CPU Options Launched in India

description: Apple's annual hardware launch event is all set to take place on September 9. The Cupertino-based tech giant is rumoured to refresh its smartwatch lineup with the introduction of new models across all three lineups — Apple Watch Series 11, Watch Ultra 3, and Watch SE 3. So with less than 10 days to go, here is everything to know about the Apple Watch Series 11, Watch Ultra 3, and Watch SE 3 ahead of Apple’s ‘Awe Dropping’ event.
title: Apple Watch Series 11, Watch Ultra 3 and Watch SE 3: Everything We Know Ahead of Apple’s ‘Awe Dropping’ Event

description: Binance has become the first major exchange to list WLFI, the governance token of Trump-affiliated World Liberty Financial. Trading opened with a Seed Tag, warning investors of risks. Reports reveal that 70 percent of the token supply is controlled by insiders, sparking debate over decentralisation and raising regulatory concerns. As most of its supply is locked, analysts caution that WLFI’s limited liquidity could fuel volatility and test whether the project is political branding or real financial innovation.
title: Binance Lists Donald Trump-Linked WLFI Token; to Be Traded on Three Blockchains

description: ChatGPT was reportedly involved in an incident where a 56-year-old man killed his mother and then committed suicide. As per the report, the man, Stein-Erik Soelberg, had a history of mental instability and grew increasingly paranoid about his mother months before the incident. During this period, he was reportedly confiding in the OpenAI chatbot, telling it all about his fears and delusions.
title: ChatGPT Reportedly Encouraged US Man's Paranoia Before He Killed Mother, Self

description: IT Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw and government officials reportedly met representatives from firms impacted by the new Online Gaming Bill on Monday. The minister held discussions with the firms over "orderly transition" and compliance with the ban on real money games.
title: IT Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw Said to Have Met Real Money Gaming Firms to Discuss Transition After Ban

description: Poco C85 has launched globally, the company announced via a social media post. The new Poco C-series smartphone is available via the official Xiaomi website in three colourways and two storage configurations. The Poco C85 is a 4G handset that sports a 50-megapixel dual-rear camera setup with LED flash. It is powered by an octa-core MediaTek Helio chip.
title: Poco C85 Launched With MediaTek Helio G81-Ultra SoC, 6,000mAh Battery: Price, Specifications

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 will commence in India soon. Ahead of the sale event, the company has teased a few deals on several smartphones, laptops, and other electronics from brands such as Samsung, Apple, iQOO, OnePlus, HP, and Sony. During the sale, the e-commerce giant will offer instant bank discounts. Apart from price cuts, customers will also be able to avail themselves of cashback offers and exchange bonuses.
title: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025: Top Deals on Smartphones, Laptops From Samsung, Apple, HP, and More Revealed

description: ChatGPT might be vulnerable to principles of persuasion, a group of researchers has claimed. During the experiment, the group used a range of prompts with different persuasion tactics such as flattery, peer pressure, and more, to GPT-4o mini, and found varying success rates. The experiment also highlights that breaking down the system hierarchy of an artificial intelligence (AI) model does not require sophisticated hacking attempts or layered prompt injections.
title: ChatGPT Provides Answers to Harmful Prompts When Tricked With Persuasion Tactics, Researchers Say

description: Honor X7d 5G has been launched in Malaysia. It has a 6,500mAh battery with 35W charging support. The new handset features a 6.77-inch display with 120Hz refresh rate. It runs on a Snapdragon 6s Gen 3 chipset and has IP65 rating for dust and water resistance.
title: Honor X7d 5G With 6,500mAh Battery, Snapdragon 6s Gen 3 Chip Launched: Specifications

description: Bitcoin is consolidating near $107,450, while Ethereum trades at $4,378 amid strong DeFi and staking interest. Institutional flows skew toward ETH, even as a whale swap boosts capital rotation. Altcoins like Solana, Dogecoin, XRP, and BNB remain choppy as sentiment splits. ETF momentum reversed, with Ethereum seeing $164 million in outflows and Bitcoin losing $126 million. Market watchers now eye whether BTC can break above $110,000 or whether ETH makes fresh gains.
title: Bitcoin Drops After August Highs, Ethereum ETF Flows Indicate Ongoing Capital Rotation

description: Flipkart has announced its biggest festival sale in India. Dubbed the Flipkart Big Billion Days Sale, the e-commerce giant will offer lucrative deals on a wide range of products across various categories. Smartphones, tablets, wearables, laptops, TVs, home appliances, and other electronics are expected to be offered at considerably lower prices than their usual market rates.
title: Flipkart Big Billion Days Sale 2025 in India Announced; Offers on iPhone 16, Samsung Galaxy S24, and More Teased

description: The Lenovo Legion Go 2 has fully leaked ahead of its official reveal. The new leak has detailed the handheld's hardware specifications, design, and features. The device will be powered by the AMD Ryzen Z2 series of chipsets and will come with a 1200p OLED screen.
title: Lenovo Legion Go 2 Fully Leaked, Revealing AMD Ryzen Z2 Extreme Chip, 78Whr Battery

description: OnePlus 15, which is expected to launch soon in China, might come with a redesigned rear camera module, the leaked render of the upcoming phone suggest. This is in line with previous leaks that hinted that OnePlus could abandon its circular rear camera island design philosophy. The handset is tipped to be offered in Black, Purple, and Titanium colourways. The storage options of the rumoured handset have also appeared online.
title: OnePlus 15 Design Leaked Online Ahead of Launch; Said to Debut in Three Colourways

description: OnePlus Pad 3 will be available to customers in India via the company’s official online store starting September 5 at 12pm IST. Launched on June 5, the tablet is powered by a Snapdragon 8 Elite chip, coupled with up to 16GB of RAM and up to 512GB of internal storage. The Chinese tech company is offering the tablet in two colourways and two storage configurations.
title: OnePlus Pad 3 Price in India, Bank Offers Announced Ahead of Open Sale on September 5

description: Oppo A6 Max was launched in China. It is released in two colour options with a 7,000mAh battery. The handset has a 6.8-inch OLED display and a dual rear camera unit led by a 50-megapixel main sensor. It is currently listed on the MobileDokan website in Bangladesh with a 'coming soon' tag.
title: Oppo A6 Max Launched With 7,000mAh Battery, Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 SoC: Price, Specifications
OPPO K13 Turbo 5G Series Overview: Definitely a Flagship Choice for Gamers Under Rs. 40,000

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 Edge could launch next year. Ahead of the formal debut, the handset has allegedly appeared on the 3C site with model number EB-BS947ABY. The listing suggests a 4,078mAh battery on the phone, which will likely be marketed as 4,200mAh.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Edge Battery Specifications Reportedly Listed on 3C Certification Site

description: WhatsApp is reportedly developing a feature that could allow iOS users to share their status updates specifically to a list of ‘Close Friends’. This feature looks to be similar to Instagram’s feature, which also allows users to post stories specifically for their close friends. Like Instagram, these ‘Close Friends’ Status updates on WhatsApp for iOS will also be distinguished with a different colour ring.
title: WhatsApp Could Soon Support Adding Status Updates for Close Friends, Just Like Instagram

description: WhatsApp has fixed a zero-click security vulnerability, which could have been used to carry out sophisticated attacks against targeted individuals, the company said. The flaw affected the Meta-owned messenger app’s iOS and macOS versions, and could “trigger processing of content from an arbitrary URL on a target's device.”
title: WhatsApp Fixes Zero-Click Vulnerability that Affects iOS, macOS Versions of the App

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 is confirmed to take place soon, as the company makes the microsite live. During the sale event, the e-commerce platform will offer instant bank discounts, cashback offers, exchange bonuses, and easy EMI options. The deals will be refreshed at 8 pm every day.
title: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 to Begin Soon With Early Access for Amazon Prime Members

description: Krafton is actively exploring acquisitions in India, according to a report. The developer behind games such as PUBG: Battlegrounds and its Indian equivalent, Battlegrounds Mobile India (BGMI), reportedly aims to capitalise on the long-standing ban enforced by the Indian government on Chinese competitors in the country’s gaming market. It is said to have plans of expanding its horizons in India, amid a growth slump in China and the US.
title: Battlegrounds Mobile India Developer to Invest $50 Million Annually, Eyes Major Expansion in India: Report

description: Developer Team Cherry has announced the pricing and global release timings for Hollow Knight: Silksong. The Metroidvania platformer will be priced at $20 in the US. The game's price in India is not confirmed yet.
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong Price, Global Release Times Confirmed Ahead of September 4 Launch

description: Meta has reportedly created numerous artificial intelligence (AI) chatbots in the name and likeness of popular celebrities without their consent across Facebook, Instagram, and WhatsApp. As per the report, the Menlo Park-based tech giant’s celebrity-mimicking chatbots were also spotted sending flirtatious and suggestive messages to users, and even sending lewd images generated using AI.
title: Meta Is Reportedly Allowing Users to Create Flirty AI Chatbots of Celebrities Without Consent

description: Qualcomm could announce the next-generation chipset, tentatively called the Snapdragon 8 Elite 2, at its Snapdragon Summit later this month. While we wait for the official release, a prominent tipster states that the chipset could set a new benchmark for mobile processors. The CPU is likely to have two prime cores and six performance cores.
title: Snapdragon 8 Elite 2 Tipped to Exceed 4 Million Points on AnTuTu Benchmark; Specifications Leaked

description: The iPhone 17 series is all set to be launched at Apple’s “Awe Dropping” event on September 9. With less than 10 days remaining till launch, leaks are now surfacing at a rapid pace. According to a recent report, all models in the iPhone 17 series could become eSIM-only in several International markets. While all iPhone variants are eSIM compatible, only the US variants of the iPhone 14 and later models come without a physical SIM tray slot.
title: iPhone 17 Series to Move Away from Physical SIM Slot, Become eSIM Only in International Markets: Report

description: Samsung Galaxy F17 5G is rumoured to be in development alongside the Galaxy M17 5G. While their launch date remains under wraps, specifications of the former have reportedly been leaked. According to a report, the purported handset will come with a 6.7-inch Super AMOLED screen. It is said to carry a triple rear camera unit, headlined by a 50-megapixel main sensor. The Samsung Galaxy F17 5G could get an IP54 rating for water and dust resistance and pack a 5,000 mAh battery.
title: Samsung Galaxy F17 5G Price in India, Specifications Reportedly Leak Ahead of Launch
